channel.title: Twitter @Google AI
channel.description: Google AI is focused on bringing the benefits of AI to everyone. In conducting and applying our research, we advance the state-of-the-art in many domains. - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: Drop by the #EMNLP2023 Google booth today at 12:30 PM to learn about an adversarial training framework that uses limited human adversarial examples to...
item.description: Drop by the #EMNLP2023 Google booth today at 12:30 PM to learn about an adversarial training framework that uses limited human adversarial examples to generate and scale more useful synthetic examples that improve LLM robustness to unseen attacks.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Current retrieval paradigms are complex, pipelined systems. Visit the #EMNLP2023 Google booth today at 10:30 AM to learn about 1-Pager, a system that ...
item.description: Current retrieval paradigms are complex, pipelined systems. Visit the #EMNLP2023 Google booth today at 10:30 AM to learn about 1-Pager, a system that aligns retrieval and reasoning as a unified task with a single Transformer-based model and decoding pass.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Join Mira Lane, Senior Director of Technology & Society at Google, and renowned media artist @RefikAnadol as they explore the power of #AI in art in t...
item.description:
Join Mira Lane, Senior Director of Technology & Society at Google, and renowned media artist @RefikAnadol as they explore the power of #AI in art in this new Dialogues episode. Full video →https://goo.gle/3GnS3iO

More from the Dialogues series →https://goo.gle/3t5iGpH
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today on the blog learn about a new algorithm for sparsity-preserving differentially private training, called adaptive filtering-enabled sparse traini...
item.description: Today on the blog learn about a new algorithm for sparsity-preserving differentially private training, called adaptive filtering-enabled sparse training (DP-AdaFEST), which is particularly relevant for applications in recommendation systems and #NLP. → https://goo.gle/46V5Bx0
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Stop by the #EMNLP2023 Google booth today at 3:30 PM for a Q&A session on Differentiable Search Indices (DSIs), DSI++, and scaling generative retrieva...
item.description: Stop by the #EMNLP2023 Google booth today at 3:30 PM for a Q&A session on Differentiable Search Indices (DSIs), DSI++, and scaling generative retrieval to answer document-related questions when documents are continually changing in an indexed corpus.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Visit the #EMNLP2023 Google booth today at 10:30 AM for a Q&A session with members of the Google Translate team on developing automatic machine transl...
item.description: Visit the #EMNLP2023 Google booth today at 10:30 AM for a Q&A session with members of the Google Translate team on developing automatic machine translation evaluation metrics & using data augmentation to improve multilingual NLP.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: At @emnlpmeeting? We hope you’ll visit the Google booth to chat with researchers who are actively pursuing the latest innovations in natural language...
item.description: At @emnlpmeeting? We hope you’ll visit the Google booth to chat with researchers who are actively pursuing the latest innovations in natural language processing! Read about our #EMNLP2023 involvement and see the booth activity schedule at https://goo.gle/3R7Q0o8
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Catch up on the lightning talks presented during Research@ NYC by researchers at Google exploring their latest innovations in climate, education, gene...
item.description: Catch up on the lightning talks presented during Research@ NYC by researchers at Google exploring their latest innovations in climate, education, generative AI, health, and more. → https://goo.gle/3tdJm7B
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today, people often interact with others in virtual spaces and augmented reality using avatars. So, in partnership with @UCF, we have developed and ar...
item.description: Today, people often interact with others in virtual spaces and augmented reality using avatars. So, in partnership with @UCF, we have developed and are releasing a new library of AR/VR avatars, called VALID, which better represents the diversity of users. https://goo.gle/3Rv0KOI
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Check out this demo from Google Research of Gemini's reasoning capabilities to understand and reason about users' intent, use tools, and generate besp...
item.description: Check out this demo from Google Research of Gemini's reasoning capabilities to understand and reason about users' intent, use tools, and generate bespoke user experiences that go beyond chat interfaces ↓ #GeminiAI
item.author: Google AI

item.title: RT Google: Introducing Gemini, Google’s largest and most capable AI model. 🧵 #GeminiAI https://goo.gle/3Rsv4cI
item.description:
RT Google
Introducing Gemini, Google’s largest and most capable AI model. 🧵 #GeminiAI https://goo.gle/3Rsv4cI
item.author: Google AI

item.title: RT Sundar Pichai: Introducing Gemini 1.0, our most capable and general AI model yet. Built natively to be multimodal, it’s the first step in our Gemi...
item.description:
RT Sundar Pichai
Introducing Gemini 1.0, our most capable and general AI model yet. Built natively to be multimodal, it’s the first step in our Gemini-era of models. Gemini is optimized in three sizes - Ultra, Pro, and Nano

Gemini Ultra’s performance exceeds current state-of-the-art results on… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732414873139589372
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Attending the @WiNLPWorkshop at #EMNLP2023? Today at 11:00 AM, don't miss the panel discussion on tackling global misinformation challenges in generat...
item.description: Attending the @WiNLPWorkshop at #EMNLP2023? Today at 11:00 AM, don't miss the panel discussion on tackling global misinformation challenges in generative AI, featuring Google researchers @sunipa17 and @PreethiLahoti. Learn more: https://www.winlp.org/winlp-2023-workshop/
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Google is a proud Major Sponsor of the @WiNLPWorkshop, happening today at #EMNLP2023 with in-person and virtual attendance options. This year, WiNLP a...
item.description: Google is a proud Major Sponsor of the @WiNLPWorkshop, happening today at #EMNLP2023 with in-person and virtual attendance options. This year, WiNLP aims to highlight global representations of people, perspectives, and cultures in AI advancements. More: https://www.winlp.org/winlp-2023-workshop/
item.author: Google AI

item.title: We are happy to be a Diamond Sponsor of the annual @emnlpmeeting, which starts today in Sentosa, Singapore. Google Research has a strong presence at #...
item.description: We are happy to be a Diamond Sponsor of the annual @emnlpmeeting, which starts today in Sentosa, Singapore. Google Research has a strong presence at #EMNLP2023 with 65+ accepted papers and participation in 11 workshops and tutorials. See the full list at: https://goo.gle/3R7Q0o8
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Because our application tool inadvertently closed early for our Research Scholar Program, we're extending the deadline until Wednesday, December 6 at ...
item.description: Because our application tool inadvertently closed early for our Research Scholar Program, we're extending the deadline until Wednesday, December 6 at 12:00PM PT. Please submit your application before then to ensure your consideration for our program. → https://goo.gle/3uRPCSV
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Coupled classical harmonic oscillators describe the physics of countless natural systems, from electrical circuits to molecular vibrations. Here we pr...
item.description: Coupled classical harmonic oscillators describe the physics of countless natural systems, from electrical circuits to molecular vibrations. Here we present a quantum computing approach to solve such problems exponentially faster than a classical computer. https://goo.gle/47JTOCY
item.author: Google AI

item.title: The Attribution Reporting API (ARA) encrypts detailed ad conversion data in aggregated summary reports that don’t rely on third-party cookies. Learn ...
item.description: The Attribution Reporting API (ARA) encrypts detailed ad conversion data in aggregated summary reports that don’t rely on third-party cookies. Learn about a method that optimizes summary reports to obtain optimal ARA parameters while preserving privacy ↓ https://goo.gle/47Ic7Zb
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Introducing Translatotron 3, an unsupervised approach to speech-to-speech translation that can learn from monolingual data, mitigating the challenges ...
item.description: Introducing Translatotron 3, an unsupervised approach to speech-to-speech translation that can learn from monolingual data, mitigating the challenges of requiring parallel speech data & opening the door to translation of the non-textual speech attributes →https://goo.gle/3T8G1S8
item.author: Google AI
